scripts.archive: tools/mkdir.mjs dist && cd app/dist && mv win-unpacked twdl && zip -9r ../../dist/twdl.zip twdl && mv twdl win-unpacked
scripts.build:app:win64:build: npm exec --workspace app -- electron-builder build --dir --win --x64 2>&1 | head -n3 || true
scripts.build:app:win64:rcedit: wine64 tools/rcedit-x64.exe app/dist/win-unpacked/twdl.exe --set-version-string FileDescription 'Twitterの画像を一括ダウンロードします' --set-version-string ProductName 'Twitter Images Downloader' --set-version-string LegalCopyright 'Copyright © 2024 kei-g' --set-file-version $(tools/version.mjs --file) --set-product-version $(tools/version.mjs --product) --set-version-string InternalName twdl --set-version-string OriginalFilename twdl.exe --set-version-string CompanyName kei-g --set-icon app/dist/.icon-ico/icon.ico && sleep 1
